title: Looking for a font similar to DTL Argo
content:
I would like to find a replacement for DTL Argo, which, as you know, is rather expensive selection. If you would have recommendations? Weights I need are medium and black, as well as respective obliques.  
Argo looks like this: [http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Images/Argo%20Black%201.GIF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004831/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Images/Argo%20Black%201.GIF "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Images/Argo%20Black%201.GIF")

I would like to use a font that has "normal" or inexpensive price. I did find a free one from [www.dafont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004831/http:/www.dafont.com/ "www.dafont.com") called Communist (that is inexpensive indeed: [http://www.dafont.com/communist.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004831/http:/www.dafont.com/communist.font "http://www.dafont.com/communist.font") ), but it's obliques are not suitable and some are even missing, also some problems with characters.
author: s k niiranen

comments.content: [Vesta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004831/http:/www.gerardunger.com/fontstore/store-vesta.html), also by Gerard Unger is also expensive, but 20% cheaper than the DTL font and has some of the same feel.

Shameless self-promotion:

[Stalemate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321004831/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/stalemate.asp) from Fountain.  
For 4% of the price.
